Scale the sketches by 0.4773. Extrude the first sketch in the positive normal direction by 0 and the opposite normal direction by 0.2727. Extrude the second sketch in the positive normal direction by 0 and the opposite normal direction by 0.2727, using "CutFeatureOperation" as the boolean operation.</description>
